ModMetaData.name: Not a Weapon
ModMetaData.description:
Removes all those "ineffective" weapons that seem to find their way into your pawns arsenal.
This mod removes the Wood Log and Beer from being equipable in the base game as well as containing patches for similar items within a variety of common and/or requested mods.
Additionally there is a fail safe patch in case any food or drink related items dont have an individual patch for their mod or if they are proving evasive to the normal patches (Looking at you devils hole pupfish)
Please load after any of the mods listed above if you have them.
Incombatible Mods: No Food Fights
As with a lot of mods there may be issues when adding mid save if pawns already have the altered items equipped. Please make sure to have them drop the items prior to installing mid save.
WARNING: If installed midsave, pawns will not drop previously equipped "ineffective" weapons.
Please let me know if there are any other mods you would like to see me add or if there are any issues.
Thanks! -Lt oddy
ModMetaData.author: Lt oddy
